mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, PRE_FILE_ADRESS, PRE_FILE_CODE, PART_CODE, FILE_CAT, FILE_NAME,CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_ATTACHMENT (CASE_CODE, PRE_FILE_ADRESS, PRE_FILE_CODE, PART_CODE, FILE_CAT, FILE_NAME,CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY) values (#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preFileAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preFileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID})

PKID,
CASE_CODE,
PRE_FILE_ADRESS,
PRE_FILE_CODE,
PART_CODE,
FILE_CAT,
FILE_NAME,
CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY,

GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID}
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_ATTACHMENT
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_FILE_ADRESS = #{preFileAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_FILE_CODE = #{preFileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_CAT = #{fileCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = GETDATE(), CREATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_ATTACHMENT set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRE_FILE_ADRESS = #{preFileAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRE_FILE_CODE = #{preFileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_CAT = #{fileCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = GETDATE(), CREATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from sctrans.T_TO_ATTACHMENT where CASE_CODE = #{prCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PKID DESC
